mapper.select:
SELECT rnum, po_no, emp_id, ilw_rcv_md, ilw_rcv_hm, ilw_rcv_itm, ilw_rcv_qty, ilw_sch_srt_tm, ilw_sch_end_tm, ilw_str_tm, ilw_wrk_tm, ilw_prg_rt, ilw_sts, ilw_lt_tm, ilw_insp_qty, ilw_pas_itm_qty, ilw_lbl_itm_qty FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, po_no, emp_id, ilw_rcv_md, ilw_rcv_hm, ilw_rcv_itm, ilw_rcv_qty, ilw_sch_srt_tm, ilw_sch_end_tm, ilw_str_tm, ilw_wrk_tm, ilw_prg_rt, ilw_sts, ilw_lt_tm, ilw_insp_qty, ilw_pas_itm_qty, ilw_lbl_itm_qty FROM ( SELECT po_no, emp_id, ilw_rcv_md, ilw_rcv_hm, ilw_rcv_itm, ilw_rcv_qty, ilw_sch_srt_tm, ilw_sch_end_tm, ilw_str_tm, ilw_wrk_tm, ilw_prg_rt, ilw_sts, ilw_lt_tm, ilw_insp_qty, ilw_pas_itm_qty, ilw_lbl_itm_qty FROM tb_insp_lbl_wrk ORDER BY po_no DESC )
)
